item.title: Pricing
item.description: SeaChat offers a range of pricing plans to suit your business needs. Choose from our flexible plans to get started with SeaChat today. Each plan includes a set of features that cater to different business requirements. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time to suit your business needs. Here we will take a look into the different pricing plans available for SeaChat. Pricing Information

item.title: Billing and Subscription
item.description: You can find all the information about billing and subscription in the billing section of the SeaChat dashboard. Find Billing in the left sidebar of the dashboard. Billing and Subscription Subscription Plan # In the Plan section, you can see the details of your current subscription plan. Edit your plan by clicking the Edit Plan button. Billing Details # Click on Cost Breakdown under Next Billing Period to see the details of your next billing details according to your subscription and usage.
